title: Attention Investment
description: The most effective way to attract the attention of a market is not by algorithmic harassment, but in the way of establishing organic everlasting relationships.

title: Strategic Improvisation

title: Conceptual Analysis
description: An answer will not be efficient until the question has been properly explored. Questioning everything is the most attractive part of the creative process.

title: Common Sense Tech
description: Digital solutions are tools at the service of ideas, not the other way around. Knowing the trends that influence collective decisions is not the same as subordinating yourself to them.
